data.name: 01_karelia/description
data.value: Two avenues of attack are divided by a swamp. The eastern side is ideal for trench warfare. The western side is favorable to a hard push. The swamp provides a risky but perhaps unexpected attack route.

data.name: 02_malinovka/description
data.value: Initial staging areas are separated by a wide open field, ideal for artillery and defensive operations. Concealment and cover including woods, hills, and farmhouses can be decisive. Attackers should consider flanking maneuvers, but another option is a well-coordinated high-speed assault across the field, which could either bring victory or a bloody loss.

data.name: 03_campania/description
data.value: Hills on the periphery of the map are covered with numerous houses and winding streets, making these areas advantageous for surprise attacks and sniping. An open area between the bases is favorable for daring strikes.

data.name: 04_himmelsdorf/description
data.value: A labyrinth of streets and squares, impassable for artillery and tank destroyers, but ideal for speedy breakthrough and bypass by medium and light tanks. Access roads running by the hill, with the castle that dominates the area, and along the railway lines can help you out of the impasse.

data.name: 05_prohorovka/description
data.value: Generally open terrain featuring a large hill and a railway embankment. Scattered trees provide concealment for tank destroyers. On the offensive, strike against the enemy's flanks, but do not leave your own flanks unguarded. Artillery enjoys good fields of fire, but is still vulnerable to raids by light tanks.

data.name: 06_ensk/description
data.value: A mixture of city blocks and wooded outskirts, bisected by railroad tracks. Plan your tactics to take advantage of defensive choke points, positioning your vehicles to cover the gaps. Artillery is great for deterring enemy breakthroughs, but remains almost defenseless when exposed to enemy vehicles attacking from cover.

data.name: 07_lakeville/description
data.value: An isolated mountain valley on one flank and city blocks on the other allow you to thrust close enough to the enemy. A large lake in the middle gives snipers a chance to show their skill at extreme range.

data.name: 08_ruinberg/description
data.value: Concentric city streets, along with dense forests and bushes in the overgrown park allow for hidden maneuvers and redeployment of your troops. Although artillery fire is of limited use in the city, the debris provides effective cover for your troops.

data.name: 10_hills/description
data.value: A high hill in the center of the map provides a perfect outpost for your attacks. A village to the north-east of the hill and an island to the west offer a wide range of tactical advantages, but lay open to fire from the center.

data.name: 11_murovanka/description
data.value: Swamps, ravines, and hills determine your battle tactics. The scarcity of buildings gives a combat advantage to artillery. Concentrating all your attacks along one axis of attack may prove the best strategy.

data.name: 13_erlenberg/description
data.value: Divided by a river, this map offers three main avenues of attack. A bridge in the center is situated among the ruins of a small town. Terrain around the northern and southern bridges offers a small amount of cover. Use the castle and the range of hills on the opposite side of the map as firing positions for your artillery.

data.name: 14_siegfried_line/description
data.value: The map is a combination of open spaces and city blocks. Meandering lanes will facilitate your surprise attacks from behind the enemy lines while numerous bunkers serve as cover.

data.name: 15_komarin/description
data.value: This map is divided into three basic sectors: western, central, and eastern. Although attacks on one flank or the other may decide the outcome, the central sector offers tactical advantages and should not be ignored.

data.name: 17_munchen/description
data.value: This map depicts an industrial city devastated by war. A railway embankment divides the map in two, making it possible to concentrate forces for an attack or counterattack.

data.name: 18_cliff/description
data.value: Opposing bases on this map are separated by cliffs and rocky ridges. A variety of cover allows for focused attacks in crucial directions. The direct route may seem ideal for a breakthrough assault, but do not neglect your flanks!

data.name: 19_monastery/description
data.value: A monastery and a town are the focal points of this map. Three roads run north-south, providing easy access from one end of the map to the other. The monastery courtyard offers perfect, but predictable, firing positions for tanks and artillery. The long hill in the west and the winding ravine in the east can serve as perfect cover from enemy fire.

data.name: 22_slough/description
data.value: A swamp in the center of the map divides it into two major sectors. Control over the center makes it very difficult for enemy units to move around freely on the flanks. The hills offer additional key vantage points for spotting and firing.

data.name: 23_westfeld/description
data.value: Lush terrain features forests and villages scattered throughout the map, while a gigantic crumbling aqueduct looms over the valley. A variety of cliffs and ridges make perfect ambush spots, but wide open areas make changing your position quite risky.

data.name: 28_desert/description
data.value: This map looks open, but appearances can be deceiving! The village houses can be used as cover for vehicles and artillery. Consider attacking on the enemy flanks safely protected from their fire by cliffs and dunes.

data.name: 29_el_hallouf/description
data.value: A spacious valley sprinkled with boulders and trees lies in the center of the map. High mountain ridges flanking the valley provide natural sniper positions. Capturing bases becomes a real feat, as both team bases are situated in easily defended hilly regions.

data.name: 31_airfield/description
data.value: This map offers many great ambush spots, as well as possibilities for maneuvers and breakthroughs. A large airfield in the upper part of the map and a rocky highland in the center offer a major tactical challenge. Occupy the highland to get a perfect view of the surrounding terrain and dominate routes to the enemy base.

data.name: 33_fjord/description
data.value: Huge mountains and narrow valleys offer great advantages in a battle. You can engage in a fire duel across the gulf or enter a close quarter battle at the nearest port town or flank and capture enemy base.

data.name: 34_redshire/description
data.value: This map is truly unique. Green fields interspersed with rolling hills offer great opportunities for aggressive attacks. The river running along the middle of the map is more of a guiding landmark than a real obstacle.

data.name: 35_steppes/description
data.value: Generally open, this map allows you to strike in multiple directions, but don't disperse your forces too much. A road in the center will take you to the enemy base more directly, but perhaps with greater difficulty. The edges of the map may offer better avenues for attacks and feints.

data.name: 36_fishing_bay/description
data.value: The map is a mix of open spaces and irregular terrain. The winding streets of the fishing village can be highly advantageous for defense or attack. Low ridges and hills scattered with bushes offer excellent ambush opportunities.

data.name: 37_caucasus/description
data.value: Steep terrain with numerous cliffs and stones can serve as a perfect cover from enemy fire. Use the hills to set up ambushes, or infiltrate the enemy base unnoticed through winding highland paths.

data.name: 38_mannerheim_line/description
data.value: This snow-covered and rocky map is abundant in various obstacles and defilades. Trails that snake around rocky mountains and along the riverside will present options for an offensive strategy, but beware: defenders will have plenty of ambush opportunities.

data.name: 39_crimea/description
data.value: The rugged terrain of this map allows a variety of battle-tactics: flanking, ambushing, or frontal assaults. There are also numerous passages between the rocks that could provide routes for a decisive attack with concentrated forces.

data.name: 43_north_america/description
data.value: This map features abundant rocks and trees. Cliffs, houses, and huge boulders provide cover, even in the most open areas of the map. Several settlements and mines can be used as strongpoints for defensive operations.

data.name: 44_north_america/description
data.value: In the centre of the map there is a large, boggy lake. A railway bridge and a ford on the one flank are defensible with scant forces, making it possible to concentrate main forces on the other flank.

data.name: 45_north_america/description
data.value: An industrial city is the preferred environment for heavy tanks. A riverside village provides good opportunities for medium tanks to position and maneuver.

data.name: 53_japan/description
data.value: The protected base of the mountain is the preferred route for heavy tanks. Fast and agile vehicles may consider a village assault. However, a hill in the center of the map provides a perfect vantage point to dominate the surrounding area. Control over this hill is often crucial.

data.name: type/assault/description1
data.value: Mission: keep the friendly base secure or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/assault/description2
data.value: Mission: capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/ctf/description
data.value: Mission: capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/domination/description
data.value: Mission: capture the base or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: 41_north_america/description
data.value: Tactics on this map may include deep flanking maneuvers along the bottom of the canyon to the enemy base or a quick attack across the plateau. On the plateau, a variety of fighting styles can be effective.

data.name: 42_north_america/description
data.value: The map is ideal for highly aggressive maneuvers. Most locations in the rail yard are open to fire from the flanks. The terrain offers few good defensive positions.

data.name: 46_north_america/description
data.value: Особенностью данной карты является изрезанный ландшафт. Холмы и овраги, пересекающие местность, удобны для манёвренного боя. Часто встречающиеся скальные массивы позволяют выбирать места для обороны и засады.

data.name: 49_africa/description
data.value: Эта карта характерна открытыми пространствами и плавными переходами ландшафта. Русло реки и невысокие холмы позволят выбрать удобное место для наступления. В качестве укрытия или места для засады, можно использовать немногочисленные хижины и выходы скальных массивов на поверхность.

data.name: 55_south_america/description
data.value: Прибрежная холмистая местность с густой тропической растительностью граничит с водным пространством. Данный рельеф удобен для засад и внезапных атак. Базы противников расположены на полуострове в непосредственной близости друг от друга. Заняв невысокий холм между ними, команда получит отличную позицию для ведения огня по обеим базам. Противники начинают бой вдалеке от своих баз, что стимулирует их к активному старту.

data.name: 59_asia_great_wall/description
data.value: This map offers many roads and canyons, giving great opportunities for light tanks and SPGs to excel. A gap in the wall is an ideal spot for fast tanks to deliver swift attacks. Other vehicles should focus on the main line of attack.

data.name: 60_asia_miao/description
data.value: Rugged terrain is favorable for various battle tactics—ambushes, unexpected flanking maneuvers, and close encounters. Moving along the riverbed allows to swiftly approach the enemy base and get into action. However, do not leave your rear undefended!

data.name: type/ctf2/description
data.value: Mission: capture at least one enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/escort/description1
data.value: Mission: keep the friendly base secure or destroy the top three enemy vehicles on the list.

data.name: type/escort/description2
data.value: Mission: capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles; however, at least one of the top three friendly vehicles on the list must survive.

data.name: 51_asia/description
data.value: This complex, jagged terrain is astonishingly beautiful. Features such as the lake, the lush bamboo thickets and the cliffs is what makes this map unique. Choose any attack direction you want, because they all have their advantages.

data.name: 47_canada_a/description
data.value: This map offers several avenues of attack, each presenting certain advantages. Slow, heavy vehicles should concentrate along the railway. Fast vehicles should quickly seize key positions, such as the peninsula and high ground, in order to provide support for the rest of the team.

data.name: 48_south_america/description
data.value: Река с высокими берегами делит данную местность на несколько частей. Высокие холмы, деревья и болотистые броды позволяют построить оборону или сосредоточить силы для атаки.

data.name: 73_asia_korea/description
data.value: Major terrain of the map features a hidden vale in the midst of the mountains. Numerous villages, rocks, trees, and bushes influence battle tactics.

data.name: 54_south_america/description
data.value: Rio Marcella possible: Rio Marcus, Rio Puebla, San romero

data.name: 67_asia_ruins/description
data.value: Jovian Foothold, Jovian ground, Jovian something, Трибунал юпитера, террасы юпитера, мегалит юпитера.

data.name: 85_winter/description
data.value: A town provides cover and concealment, making it a good position for a rugged defense. The open area in the north offers great opportunities for fast vehicles to maneuver aggressively and break through to the enemy base.

data.name: 63_tundra/description
data.value: The mountain in the east offers the possibility of dominating from the high ground, while the central part of the map offers a wide range of tactical advantages. A village and a bypass road are located in the west, creating an opportunity for unexpected maneuvers and tactics.

data.name: 84_winter/description
data.value: A town is the most protected environment that is ideal for a rugged defense. Open area in the north offers great opportunities for a breakthrough to the enemy base and aggressive maneuvers in light vehicles.

data.name: 86_himmelsdorf_winter/description
data.value: A labyrinth of streets and squares, impassable for artillery and tank destroyers, but ideal for speedy breakthrough and bypass by medium and light tanks. Access roads running by the hill, with the castle that dominates the area, and along the railway lines can help you out of the impasse.

data.name: 87_ruinberg_on_fire/description
data.value: Concentric city streets, along with dense forests and bushes in the overgrown park allow for hidden maneuvers and redeployment of your troops. Although artillery fire is of limited use in the city, the debris provides effective cover for your troops.

data.name: type/nations/description
data.value: Mission: capture the base or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: 83_kharkiv/description
data.value: City blocks in the center of the map bear the highest strategic importance. The map also offers two alternative options: the city square, perfect for long distance fighting; and an open area, excellent for fast vehicles.

data.name: 99_himmelball/description
data.value: Fight an intense battle to win the Himmelsdorf Сhampionship!

data.name: type/football/description
data.value: Mission: score 3 goals. Match time: 5 minutes.

data.name: 96_prohorovka_defense/description
data.value: Generally open terrain featuring a large hill and a railway embankment. Scattered trees provide concealment for tank destroyers. On the offensive, strike against the enemy's flanks, but do not leave your own flanks unguarded. Artillery enjoys good fields of fire, but is still vulnerable to raids by light tanks.

data.name: 102_deathtrack/description
data.value: Fasten your seat belts! On your marks! Get set! Go!

data.name: 92_stalingrad/description
data.value: Dense urban conditions in the center of the map are the setting for close-quarters encounters, while the waterfront is suitable for fast-paced engagements and more maneuverable vehicles.

data.name: type/assault2/description1
data.value: Mission: keep the friendly bases secure or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/assault2/description2
data.value: Mission: capture one of the enemy bases or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: 100_thepit/description
data.value: The town in the hollow is an arena ravaged by the fierce clashes of steel-clad beasts. The vehicles are trying to shield themselves from the shelling of enemy artillery, while warily advancing to victory through the smoldering ruins.

data.name: 103_ruinberg_winter/description
data.value: Concentric city streets, along with dense forests and bushes in the overgrown park, allow for hidden movement and the redeployment of your troops. Artillery fire is of limited use in the city, as the debris provides effective cover for your team.

data.name: 109_battlecity_ny/description
data.value: This complex, jagged terrain is astonishingly beautiful. Features such as the lake, the lush bamboo thickets and the cliffs is what makes this map unique. Choose any attack direction you want, because they all have their advantages.

data.name: 95_lost_city/description
data.value: This presidio located in the desert sands is an ideal setting for head-on heavy vehicle encounters, while the more maneuverable vehicles can launch surprise attacks by flanking the enemy.

data.name: 101_dday/description
data.value: The shoreline can be used by maneuverable vehicles to execute lightning attacks into the enemy rear. The central and eastern parts of the map are well-suited for methodical attacks by heavy vehicles with the support of allies.

data.name: type/fallout/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy.

data.name: 96_prohorovka_defense_test/description
data.value: Generally open terrain featuring a large hill and a railway embankment. Scattered trees provide concealment for tank destroyers. On the offensive, strike against the enemy's flanks, but do not leave your own flanks unguarded. Artillery enjoys good fields of fire, but is still vulnerable to raids by light tanks.

data.name: type/fallout1/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy.

data.name: type/fallout2/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy.

data.name: type/fallout3/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy.

data.name: type/fallout4/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/fallout5/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/fallout6/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/falloutMutliteam/description
data.value: Mission: earn more victory points than the enemy.

data.name: type/sandbox/description1
data.value: Mission: capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: 114_czech/description
data.value: Recent intelligence shows that the best tactic is to flank the enemy. The plant in the center may turn out to be a trap. Our reconnaissance units advise using it for a quick breakthrough at the end of the battle.

data.name: 112_eiffel_tower_ctf/description
data.value: Tight winding streets provide great cover for allied heavy vehicles. The central square is dangerous because shots can come from all directions, while the embankment of the Seine is an ideal area for approaches in fast, maneuverable vehicles.

data.name: type/bootcamp/description0
data.value: Follow the tips to complete the mission

data.name: type/bootcamp/description1
data.value: Find and destroy all enemy vehicles

data.name: type/bootcamp/description3
data.value: Capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles

data.name: type/bootcamp/description4
data.value: Capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles

data.name: type/bootcamp/description5
data.value: Capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles

data.name: 212_epic_random_valley/description
data.value: Two massive mountains surround this peaceful valley. The space is watched over by the ruins of a castle, ruling over the nearby lake and woods. Vast fields are the perfect opportunity for fast and stealthy flanking, while a small village offers a more direct path into battle.

data.name: type/ctf30x30/description
data.value: Mission: capture the enemy base or destroy all enemy vehicles.

data.name: type/domination30x30/description
data.value: Mission: capture the base or destroy all enemy vehicles.
